member.name: CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC.CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.
member.param: Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC.CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC structure that is initialized with values.
member.param: A -typed value that specifies the texture format.

Texture width (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE2D_U_OR_V_DIMENSION (16384). For a texture cube-map, the range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURECUBE_DIMENSION (16384). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

Texture height (in texels). The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE2D_U_OR_V_DIMENSION (16384). For a texture cube-map, the range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURECUBE_DIMENSION (16384). However, the range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.

Number of textures in the texture array. The range is from 1 to D3D11_REQ_TEXTURE2D_ARRAY_AXIS_DIMENSION (2048). For a texture cube-map, this value is a multiple of 6 (that is, 6 times the value in the NumCubes member of ), and the range is from 6 to 2046. The range is actually constrained by the feature level at which you create the rendering device.
The maximum number of mipmap levels in the texture. See the remarks in . Use 1 for a multisampled texture; or 0 to generate a full set of subtextures.
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies how to bind the texture to pipeline stages.
A -typed value that identifies how the texture is to be read from and written to.
A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value specifies the types of CPU access allowed.

A combination of -typed values that are combined by using a bitwise OR operation. The resulting value identifies other, less common resource options. For a texture cube-map, set the flag. Cube-map arrays (that is, arraySize > 6) require feature level or higher.

member.name: CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC.CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC
member.summary: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC structure.

member.name: CD3D11_TEXTURE2D_DESC
member.summary: Represents a 2D texture and provides convenience methods for creating 2D textures.
